X.ii.6.F.1.b
.
Rating of Incompetency Subsequent to Admission to a Medical Institution
If a Veteran is rated incompetent subsequent to admission to a medical institution, request any information, reports, or summaries that may be required as a result of the Veteran’s incompetency.
Note
:  Request information from a VA medical center (VAMC) via the Compensation and Pension Records Interchange (CAPRI).
Reference
:  For information on using CAPRI, see the
CAPRI User Guide
.
